summary.span: 提供最佳畫質、固定格式頁面的內容。

span.span: Provides the content for a high fidelity, fixed-format page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常用來提供內容內的頁面。 is typically used to provide the content for a page within a . 自動定義分頁符號的開始和結束其內容。 automatically defines page breaks at the start and end of its content. ## Examples 下列範例會示範搭配類別。The following example shows use of the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Rect BleedBox { System::Windows::Rect get(); void set(System::Windows::Rect value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定一個矩形，這個矩形會定義出血、十字線對位標記和裁切線的溢位區域。

span.span: Gets or sets a rectangle defining the overflow area for bleeds, registration marks, and crop marks.
The defining the overflow area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來指定列印產出相關滲漏、 註冊標記，以及可能會延伸到的邏輯頁面之外的裁切線的擴充的區域。 is used to specify an expanded area for print production-related bleeds, registration marks, and crop marks that may extend outside the logical page. 邏輯頁面屬於的工作表，為其最終大小裁剪後仍會保留。The logical page is the part of the sheet that will remain after it has been cropped to its final size. 因此滲漏方塊的大小可能會不小於邏輯頁面大小，但可能更大。So the dimensions of the bleed box can be no smaller than the logical page size, but may be greater. 對比與這是在其可以顯示內容; 頁面的區域即是該頁面的一部分*內*邊界。Contrast the with the which is the area of the page on which content can appear; that is, the part of the page that is *within* the margins. 因此，內容方塊的維度可以是不能大於頁面上，但可能較小。So the dimensions of the content box can be no larger than the page, but may be smaller. 和滲漏方塊和內容方塊的內容會測量從左邊和和屬性以從頂端。The and properties of both the bleed box and the content box are measured from the left and the and properties are measured from the top. 因此，下列規則必須強制執行定義和:Hence, the following rules must be enforced in defining the and : - .. 必須小於或等於。。must be less than or equal to .. - .. 必須小於或等於。。must be less than or equal to .. - .. 必須是大於或等於。。must be greater than or equal to .. - .. 必須是大於或等於。。must be greater than or equal to .. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

The of the child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回`null`如果是資料繫結和子系項目無法加入或手動移除。 returns `null` if the is data-bound and child elements cannot be added or removed manually. 在非資料繫結使用手動允許應用程式或子項目。In non data-bound uses, allows the application to manually or child elements.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Rect ContentBox { System::Windows::Rect get(); void set(System::Windows::Rect value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定內容區域的週框，亦即在邊界「之內」的頁面區域 (若有的話)。

span.span: Gets or sets the bounding rectangle of the content area; that is, the area of the page *within* the margins, if any.
The that defines the content area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義下列規則必須強制執行:The following rules must be enforced in defining the : - .. 必須是大於或等於零 (0)，且小於或等於 (。-1)。must be greater than or equal to zero (0), and less than or equal to (.-1). - .. 必須是大於或等於零 (0)，且小於或等於 (。-1)。must be greater than or equal to zero (0), and less than or equal to (.-1). - .. 必須是大於或等於 (。+ 1)。must be greater than or equal to (.+1). - .. 必須是大於或等於 (。+ 1)。must be greater than or equal to (.+1). - 相關的相對大小的規則和，請參閱主題。For rules about the relative sizes of the and the , see the topic . - ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位- Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|- None- None| -

The for the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A告訴您如何列印資料; 例如，是否使用雙面列印應。A contains information about how material should be printed; for example, whether or not two-sided printing should be used. 設定這個 屬性不會驗證或修改特定 的指定 。Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified for a particular . 如有需要，請使用 方法建立對指定的印表機有效的 專用 。If needed, use the method to create a -specific that is valid for a given printer. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetBottom (System.Windows.UIElement element, double length);
.method public static hidebysig void SetBottom(class System.Windows.UIElement element, float64 length) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetBottom (element As UIElement, length As Double)
public: static void SetBottom(System::Windows::UIElement ^ element, double length);

param.name: element
param.span: 要設定底端位移的項目。

span.span: The element on which to set the bottom offset.

param.name: length
param.span: 項目底邊與其父代畫布底邊之間的新距離。

span.span: The new distance between the bottom side of the element and the bottom side of its parent canvas.

summary.span: 設定項目底端與其父代 底端之間的距離。

span.span: Sets the distance between the bottom of an element and the bottom of its parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子項目的底端位移不會影響父項畫布的大小。The child element's bottom offset does not affect the size of the parent canvas. 如果已在相同的項目上指定的頂端和底端位移，頂端位移的優先順序較高。If both a top and a bottom offset have been specified on the same element, the top offset takes precedence. 當設定下方的位移，以百分比表示，百分比值為基礎的父項畫布大小。When setting the bottom offset as a percentage, the percentage value is based on the size of the parent canvas.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetLeft (System.Windows.UIElement element, double length);
.method public static hidebysig void SetLeft(class System.Windows.UIElement element, float64 length) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetLeft (element As UIElement, length As Double)
public: static void SetLeft(System::Windows::UIElement ^ element, double length);

span.span: The element on which to set the left offset.

param.name: length
param.span: 項目左邊與其父代畫布左邊之間的新距離。

span.span: The new distance between the left side of the element and the left side of its parent canvas.

summary.span: 設定項目左邊與其父代 左邊之間的距離。

span.span: Sets the distance between the left side of an element and the left side of its parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子項目的向左的位移不會影響父項畫布的大小。The child element's left offset does not affect the size of the parent canvas. 如果已在相同的元素指定同時左側和右側的位移，左的位移的優先順序較高。If both a left and right offset have been specified on the same element, the left offset takes precedence. 設定時左的位移以百分比表示，百分比值根據與父項畫布的寬度。When setting the left offset as a percentage, the percentage value is based on the width of the parent canvas. ## Examples 下列範例會示範搭配方法。The following example shows use of the method. [!code-csharp[XpsSave#XpsSaveCreateFixedPage5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/CSharp/XpfContent.cs#xpssavecreatefixedpage5)] [!code-vb[XpsSave#XpsSaveCreateFixedPage5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/visualbasic/xpfcontent.vb#xpssavecreatefixedpage5)]
